onboarding.title: Become a Vendor on GreenFood.live
onboarding.subtitle: Join our agricultural marketplace and reach thousands of customers
onboarding.success: Welcome to GreenFood Marketplace! Your vendor store has been created.

form.storeDescriptionHint: Brief description of your farm and products (max 500 characters)
form.storeDescriptionPlaceholder: We are a family-owned organic farm specializing in fresh vegetables and herbs...
form.storeCategoriesHint: Select all categories that apply to your products
form.storeLogoHint: Square image, 512x512 recommended (JPG, PNG, WebP, max 5MB)

validation.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.slugTooShort: Slug must be at least 3 characters
validation.slugTooLong: Slug must be less than 50 characters
validation.nameTooShort: Store name must be at least 3 characters
validation.nameTooLong: Store name must be less than 100 characters
validation.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 500 characters
validation.categoriesRequired: Please select at least one category
validation.logoTooBig: Logo file size must be less than 5MB
validation.logoInvalidType: Logo must be JPG, PNG, or WebP

products.title: My Products
products.noProducts: You haven't added any products yet
products.addFirstProduct: Add your first product to start selling

form.photoHint: Upload 1-5 high-quality photos. First photo will be the main image.
form.photoPlaceholder: Drag & drop photos or click to browse
form.name: Product Name
form.daarPriceHint: Auto-calculated from UAH price if left empty
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Fresh organic tomatoes from our farm...
form.activeInMyStoreHint: Make product visible in your vendor storefront
form.submitToMainStoreHint: Submit for admin review to list in main marketplace

validation.nameTooShort: Product name must be at least 3 characters
validation.nameTooLong: Product name must be less than 100 characters
validation.priceInvalid: Price must be a positive number
validation.stockInvalid: Stock must be a non-negative number
validation.photoRequired: At least one photo is required
validation.photoSizeExceeded: Photo size must be less than 5MB
validation.photoInvalidType: Photos must be JPG, PNG, or WebP
validation.videoSizeExceeded: Video size must be less than 50MB
validation.videoInvalidType: Video must be MP4 or WebM
validation.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 200 characters

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Product
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.

notifications.productSubmitted: Product submitted to Main Store for review
notifications.vendorCreated: Vendor store created successfully! Welcome to GreenFood.live
notifications.approvalPending: Your product is pending admin review
notifications.approvalApproved: Congratulations! '{name}' has been approved for Main Store

startWrapper.completeStoreInfo: Complete store information and logo to reach 100%

aiEnrichment.title: AI Product Enrichment
aiEnrichment.description: Upload photo + basic info, AI generates descriptions, tags, and recommendations

automatedSettlements.title: Automated Settlements
automatedSettlements.description: Sales automatically processed, commissions calculated, payouts scheduled

daarRewards.title: DAAR Token Rewards
daarRewards.description: Earn up to 25% bonus tokens for regenerative agriculture practices

trustTier.title: Trust Tier System
trustTier.description: Start at 20% commission, earn your way to 12% through quality and sales

vendorGuide.title: Vendor Guide
vendorGuide.description: Learn how to set up and manage your store effectively

startPage.title: Vendor Onboarding
startPage.subtitle: Set up your store and start selling on GreenFood.live
